channel.title: Virus download?
channel.description:
I want to download a virus (for windows only) and run it on my linux machine to show my mom that there are no viruses(or very few) for linux and windows viruses wont run on linux without WINE or even with WINE. She wont buy anything at all off the internet for this reason.
I need to get one of the top viruses. Anywhere I can get them, or do I need to contact the author of the virus?

item.title: Virus download?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Moparisthebest:

edit: or explain that windows and linux use different executable file formats and so windows viruses flat out can’t run on linux?

And explain that the only real virus easily accessible for linux is one that you would have to run, and it wouldn’t be open source, but then why would you run a closed source app, from an untrusted source, on an open source operating system?

Read full topic

item.title: Virus download?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Lol, my luck, I would try to prove a point like that and get a cross platform virus -.-’ well you could just make a basic .bat file that would do something harmful to the windows system, would be easy enough

Read full topic

item.title: Virus download?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Sounds like she doesn’t know much, so just tell her a file is a virus and that it didn’t hurt anything.

edit: or explain that windows and linux use different executable file formats and so windows viruses flat out can’t run on linux?

Read full topic

item.title: Virus download?
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

How do I know that it actually works?

Log file to show me what I type?

A virus that harms the windows system is what I want.

Read full topic

item.title: Virus download?
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

An executable would be nicer.

Read full topic

I know 3 Virus that are easy to get: Windows, Norton og IE.

item.title: Virus download?
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“ThatOneServer, post:2, topic:176971”][quote author=Rajae link=topic=237779.msg2021254#msg2021254 date=1201633964]
I want to download a virus (for windows only) and run it on my linux machine to show my mom that there are no viruses(or very few) for linux and windows viruses wont run on linux without WINE or even with WINE. She wont buy anything at all off the internet for this reason.

I need to get one of the top viruses. Anywhere I can get them, or do I need to contact the author of the virus?
[/quote]

Go to sythe.org. It won’t take long to find one.[/quote]
lol and i saw on one of there posts over there that they have virus scanners to scan every file >.< i think there using nortan

Read full topic
